items.sentence: Tom already had the CD that Mary gave him for his birthday, but he didn't say so.
I have three weeks left until my departure, and so far I still don't have a visa.
Is it really true that 30% of the people who live here have never seen the ocean?
If a police officer accused you of a crime you didn't commit, what would you say?
If you had the chance to change a single event in history, which one would it be?
I could tell that Tom was angry, but I don't think anyone else in the room could.
Mr. Jackson is in the hospital, so I'll be your teacher for the next three weeks.
You could try the store across the street. They may have what you're looking for.
There are several things left on my list of things to do that I haven't done yet.
Tom wasn't the only one who didn't eat anything. Mary didn't eat anything either.
